Key Match Events: Paul George hyper-extended his left knee while guarding Atlanta's Jalen Johnson in the first half.
George scored eight points on three-of-five shooting with two rebounds, one assist, and one steal in just over 12 minutes on court.
Post-Match Reflections: Paul George told the Philadelphia Inquirer that he felt the hyper-extension and knew he needed to have the knee examined but added 'I'm not too concerned about it.'
Sixers coach Nick Nurse said he was hopeful George would be back in action 'right away'.
Philadelphia announced that star big man Joel Embiid wouldn't play in any pre-season games as part of the management plan for his surgically repaired left knee.
Nurse said he was 'not really sure where we're at with that' regarding Embiid's availability for the 76ers' season-opener against Milwaukee on October 23.
